title: Lissandra The Sand Witch
body:
Hello. my summoner name is kanekomodera.

I made images suggesting some new skin for League of Legends

thank you for all of your efforts!

replies.body: I love it!
This guy has posted some other concept arts in the forums. I would really consider looking at his other works.
As a new summoner to this community off game its very nice to see you guys interact with us like this especially on this sub-community! :) Thanks for making me proud to be a part of the rift.
i like. lol the recall animation could be her nonchalantly eating a sandwhich

Interesting but doubtful. Sand is extremely system intensive and often looks bad. Given that they are actively removing the sand effects from Nasus due to these issues, I doubt they will make a skin with a sand theme.

Well, they could always just have her take on a sandstone theme.  It wouldn't be a "sand tornado" she'd be standing in.  She'd come out of the sandstone (like she does ice or bloodstone), and her Q/ult would be sandstone themed.  The few particle effects on her missile could be done with sand particles, considering they're on the screen for such a brief period.

Overall, I think this would be an awesome theme for any upcoming Shurima patch.

Sandstorm Lissandra.

Nice.
Riot pls

I just posted up my idea for a champ, but I have to say. I really like this idea, aside from the funny puns. Have you put in any thought to what the abilities might be like? That's my favorite part with skins, the edited animations. I can see a lot of potential for the ult to be a sarcophagus. Her Q could shoot pyramids. Her W could be quicksand. Her E could be a sandstorm or giant head, like from the movie the mummy. There's a lot of potential to this and I like it.
Seems cool and nice job on the art
I can definitely see myself buying that skin.
Amazing artwork! That touch with the broken bow and the little details are so cool. Also the new element to the skin opens a lot of creative possibilities for the animations and particle effects.
The sej falling too. I kinda wish skins came with their own separate/extended lore...that'd be SWEET
Omg love the art and the idea RIOT PLS
darude lissandra
Everyone wants a piece of Shurima... {{item:3070}} {{champion:268}}
Wow this is totally kick@ass!!! :D :D :D {{summoner:10}}
11.6/10 would buy

Lissandra pls.. you are already the queen of the ice land.
Why the hell do you want to conquer sand land? You will get suntan!

Tat is a good artwork. 
Whose the dead character?
jk
Love Lissandra so much! I think this skin would be an excellent! I would defiantly buy! The Art for this is **amazing** by the way Thumbs up!
"The shifting sands consume all."
cool
That is not too bad at all...Although personally I want more of a Volcanic or Wildfyre Lissandra.
Impressive, not bad
Pretty nice!
yeah nice art

Clever.

And that art is awesome.
